content: I have a usecase where I only have deps and no own wit files, so I would like to use a wit/deps directory without a wit file in wit/, but I have to add a wit file with a package line to wit/ to make it work, is that known?

Currently you need to add a dummy *.wit file and https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-tools/issues/1462 is the issue for relaxing this

Don't require the `wit/` root directory to contain a package 路 Issue #1462 路 bytecodealliance/wasm-tools
As an incremental step along the lines of #1461, it would be nice to allow a wit/ directory to not contain a root/default package. The scope of this issue would keep the deps/*/*.wit structure in p...
Ramon Klass has marked this topic as resolved.
